item.description:
Lebanon Opera House/Gordon Lightfoot. Concert starts at 7:30PM.
A benefit for COVER Home Repair.

http://www.lebanonoperahouse.org/event.php?id=922

With such hits as "If You Could Read My Mind," "Sundown," and "The Wreck of the Edmund Fitzgerald," few singer/songwriters have given as much quality material to the medium as Canadian-born troubadour Gordon Lightfoot. A five time Grammy nominee and seventeen time Juno winner, Gordon Lightfoot is also a member of the Canadian Songwriters Hall of Fame. His songs have been recorded by everyone from Elvis Presley to Barbara Streisand to Bob Dylan. Donâ€™t miss this legend live in concert!

Not sure that I am going, but thought I would post in case there is someone interested. Dinner before is always an option too.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Gordon Lightfoot at the Lebanon Opera House.
